scheduler

Class TimeSlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • scheduler.TimeSlot

  • public class TimeSlot
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will store 2 timepoints. It then represents the timeslot between those 2 points.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Default Constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TimeSlot

        public TimeSlot(TimePoint t1,
        TimePoint t2)
        Default Constructor. Will initialise both time points.
        Throws:
        illegalargumentexception - if t1 is an endpoint or t2 is a startpoint if t2 is before or at the same time as t2

      • getLength

        public long getLength()
        Returns:
        The length of the timespan that this timeslot covers.

      • overlaps

        public boolean overlaps(TimeSlot timeslot)
        Checks wether this timeslot overlaps the given timeslot. Back-to-back scheduling is not considered as overlapping.
        Parameters:
        timeslot - The given timeslot
        Returns:
        true if the given timeslot overlaps this timeslot

        public static boolean isValidTimeSlot(TimeSlot timeSlot)
        Checks wether the given timeSlot is a valid timeSlot.
        Parameters:
        timeSlot - The timeslot that has to be checked for consistency
        Returns:
        true is the given timeslot is valid
